cells.data:
-- Lift a binary function to actions.
-- e.g.
-- liftA2(mult, {1, 2, 3}, {4, 5, 6}) 
--> {4, 5, 6, 8, 10, 12, 12, 15, 18}

-- liftA2 :: Applicative f => (a -> b -> c) -> f a -> f b -> f c
on liftA2(f, a, b)
    set c to class of a
    if c is list or c is text then
        liftA2List(f, a, b)
    else
        set t to typeName(a)
        if "(a -> b)" = t then
            liftA2Fn(f, a, b)
        else if "Either" = t then
            liftA2LR(f, a, b)
        else if "Maybe" = t then
            liftA2May(f, a, b)
        else if "Tuple" = t then
            liftA2Tuple(f, a, b)
        else if "Node" = t then
            liftA2Tree(f, a, b)
        else
            missing value
        end if
    end if
end liftA2
